comp3111.webscraper

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp3111.webscraper.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Item>

    public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Item>
    Class which is used to store the information of the posted items in both portals. It implements Comparable base class to extend its functionality to be sorted by the price in a Collections-implemented containers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.Double price,
            java.lang.String url,
            java.lang.String portal,
            java.util.Date postedDate)
        Public constructor which is used to instantiate an object while setting up its attributes in one line
        Parameters:
        title - name of the item posted
        price - in USD. If no price specified, will have 0.0.
        url - address of the posted item page in its respective portal
        portal - amazon / craigslist address
        postedDate - Date object of which the date is posted, in HKT

      • Item

        public Item()
        Default constructor of the item, instantiate the object without instantiate any values

        Returns:

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice()
        Public method to retrieve the price of the posted item. Price is stored in USD.
        Returns:
        price of the item in USD. Price is 0.0 if no information available

        Parameters:
        portal - absolute url address of the portal

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Item item)
        Method used for the purpose of sorting the collections of items in the Collections-implemented container. It compares the item based on the price.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Item>
        Returns:
        -1 if the this (first argument) item has less price, 0 if both items have equal price, 1 if this ( first argument) item has larger price.
